text: The silent majority, a term made famous by Richard Nixon, is an unspecified majority of people in a demographic who are perceived as not expressing their opinions publicly. Silent Majority may also refer to: * Silent Majority (hip hop group), a Swiss hip hop group * Silent Majority (comics), a DC Comics character * "Silent Majority" (song), song by Keyakizaka46 * Silent Majority (Terry Allen's Greatest Missed Hits), an album by Terry Allen * Silent Majority Group, a record label
title: Silent Majority (disambiguation)
